abstract: Sets the tab bar item associated with this view.

declaration.code: nonisolated func tabItem<V>(@ViewBuilder _ label: () -> V) -> some View where V : View

overview:
## Discussion

Use `tabItem(_:)` to configure a view as a tab bar item in a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TabView]. The example below adds two views as tabs in a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TabView]:

items.description: A view for presenting a stack of views that represents a visible path in a navigation hierarchy.
items.name: NavigationView

title: tabItem(_:)
